data.eml:eml: Sarcophaga (Hoa) flexuosa Ho (Diptera: Sarcophagidae): association of sexes using morphological and molecular approaches, and a redefinition of Hoa Rohdendorf

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Dong, Zhang, Ming, Pape, Thomas, Gu, Cai-Wei, Wu, Wei (2013): Sarcophaga (Hoa) flexuosa Ho (Diptera: Sarcophagidae): association of sexes using morphological and molecular approaches, and a redefinition of Hoa Rohdendorf. Zootaxa 3670 (1): 71-79, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.1.6
